# @sandiiarov/exa-cli

> A powerful CLI tool for the Exa AI search API. Query the web with semantic search, extract content from URLs, get AI-powered answers, and citations, and conduct automated research - all from your terminal.

## Overview

@sandiiarov/exa-cli is a zero-dependency command-line interface for the Exa AI search API. It provides intuitive commands for semantic web search, content extraction, AI-powered Q&A, and automated research tasks. Built with Bun and TypeScript, it outputs beautifully formatted markdown by default with JSON support for scripting.

## Installation

```bash
# Install globally via npm
npm install -g @sandiiarov/exa-cli

# Or use with npx (no installation required)
npx @sandiiarov/exa-cli search "AI startups"

# Or install with Bun
bun install @sandiiarov/exa-cli
```

## Configuration

Set your Exa API key as an environment variable:

```bash
export EXA_API_KEY="your-api-key-here"
```

Or pass it with each command using `--api-key`.

Get your API key at: https://dashboard.exa.ai/api-keys

## Quick Start

```bash
# Search the web
exa search "latest AI developments"

# Search with content extraction
exa search "machine learning papers" --text --num-results 5

# Get AI-powered answers
exa answer "What is quantum computing?"

# Find similar pages
exa similar "https://example.com/article"

# Conduct automated research
exa research "Latest SpaceX valuation" --poll
```

## Core Commands

### Search
Search the web using semantic search.

```bash
exa search "query" [options]
```

**Options:**
- `--num-results <n>`: Number of results (default: 10)
- `--type <auto|fast|deep|instant>`: Search type
- `--text`: Include full text content
- `--highlights`: Include relevant highlights
- `--summary`: Include AI-generated summary
- `--category <category>`: Filter by category
- `--include-domains <list>`: Comma-separated domains to include
- `--exclude-domains <list>`: Comma-separated domains to exclude
- `--start-date <date>`: Start date (ISO format)
- `--end-date <date>`: End date (ISO format)
- `--autoprompt`: Use autoprompt to enhance query

**Categories:** company, research paper, news, pdf, tweet, personal site, financial report, people

### Contents
Retrieve contents from specific URLs.

```bash
exa contents <url...> [options]
```

**Options:**
- `--text`: Include full text
- `--highlights`: Include highlights
- `--summary`: Include summary
- `--max-age-hours <n>`: Maximum age of cached content

### Similar
Find pages similar to a given URL.

```bash
exa similar <url> [options]
```

**Options:**
- `--num-results <n>`: Number of results
- `--exclude-source-domain`: Exclude same domain
- `--text`, `--highlights`, `--summary`: Content options
- `--category <category>`: Filter by category

### Answer
Get AI-powered answers with citations.

```bash
exa answer "query" [options]
```

**Options:**
- `--text`: Include source text in citations
- `--model <exa|exa-pro>`: Model to use (default: exa)
- `--stream`: Stream response in real-time
- `--system-prompt <text>`: Custom system prompt

### Research
Create automated research tasks.

```bash
exa research "instructions" [options]
```

**Options:**
- `--model <fast|regular|pro>`: Research model
- `--poll`: Poll until completion
- `--poll-interval <ms>`: Polling interval (default: 1000)
- `--timeout <ms>`: Timeout (default: 600000)

### Research Status
Check research task status.

```bash
exa research-status <task-id>
```

### Research List
List all research tasks.

```bash
exa research-list [options]
```

**Options:**
- `--limit <n>`: Number of tasks
- `--cursor <token>`: Pagination cursor

## Global Options

- `--api-key <key>`: Exa API key
- `--json`: Output raw JSON instead of markdown
- `-h, --help`: Show help

## Examples

### Semantic Search
```bash
# Basic search
exa search "hottest AI startups 2024"

# Deep search with content
exa search "transformer architecture" --type deep --text --highlights

# Filter by category and date
exa search "AI acquisitions" --category news --start-date 2024-01-01

# Domain filtering
exa search "research" --include-domains "arxiv.org,openai.com"
```

### Content Extraction
```bash
# Get article text
exa contents "https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.15004" --text

# Multiple URLs with highlights
exa contents "https://example.com/1" "https://example.com/2" --highlights --summary
```

### AI Q&A
```bash
# Basic answer
exa answer "What is neural machine translation?"

# Streaming response
exa answer "Explain large language models" --stream

# With custom prompt
exa answer "Explain recursion" --system-prompt "Explain like I'm 5"
```

### Research Workflow
```bash
# Create and poll research task
exa research "SpaceX valuation and funding history" --poll

# Check status later
exa research-status "task-id"

# List all tasks
exa research-list --limit 10
```

## Development

```bash
# Install dependencies
bun install

# Run in development
bun run src/index.ts search "test"

# Run tests
bun test

# Build executable
bun run build
```
